means: 阻碍，妨碍( hinder的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: That hindered him from going further.
The crowd hindered him from leaving.
sentence.Network_cn: 人群挡着他,使他走不开.

sentence.Network_en: That hindered him in carrying out his plan.
sentence.Network_cn: 那使他不能执行他的计划.

a feeling of annoyance at being hindered or criticized., 由于被阻拦或批评而产生的烦恼的情绪.
hinder 阻滞, hindered 受阻的, hinder 黏合剂
synthesis of hindered phenolic antioxidant for plastics ., 塑料用位阻酚类抗氧剂合成方法.

list.abs: hindered phenol 受阻酚hindered settling 沉降受阻hindrance 干扰
1. 铰链hindered torsion 受阻扭转joint 铰结点
Hindeodus 欣德牙形石属hindered phenol 受阻酚hindered settling 沉降受阻
... ◎ 拖债[ default a debt] ◎ 拖后腿[ hinder (or impede) sb.;be a drag on sb.;hold sb. back] (2) 同本义[ drag;haul;pull].

entry.def: If something hinders you, it makes it more difficult for you to do something or make progress.

example.ex: Does the fact that your players are part-timers help or hinder you?...
example.tran: 队员们都是兼职的，这对你有利还是不利？

example.ex: Further investigation was hindered by the loss of all documentation on the case.
example.tran: 由于案件卷宗全部丢失致使进一步的调查受阻。

entry.def: If something hinders your movement, it makes it difficult for you to move forward or move around.

example.ex: A thigh injury increasingly hindered her mobility...
example.tran: 大腿受伤使她行动愈发不便。

example.ex: Landslides and bad weather are continuing to hinder the arrival of relief supplies to the area.
example.tran: 滑坡和恶劣天气仍在阻碍救援物资运送到该地区。

auth_sentence.content: Rubble from the building hindered later rescue efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rubble from the building hindered later rescue efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rubble from the building hindered later rescue efforts.

auth_sentence.content: Weak manufacturing activity hindered India's gross domestic product growth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Weak manufacturing activity hindered India's gross domestic product growth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Weak manufacturing activity hindered India's gross domestic product growth.

auth_sentence.content: Damage to power and communications systems further hindered rescue efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Damage to power and communications systems further hindered rescue efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Damage to power and communications systems further hindered rescue efforts.

Sentence.sentence: Some government policies aided recovery; some hindered it.
Case studies of children who were isolated from others reveal that they lack a firm self-concept, and their mental and psychological development is severely hindered by lack of language.
